snippet.title: Game & Watch: Squish (c)1986 Nintendo [MAME emulation footage]
snippet.description:
This the Game & Watch Squish handheld game, a Nintendo product released in 1986.  There is an older video of this on the channel, but it lacked the case artwork.

This game has similar gameplay to Search Results Devil World on the NES / Famicom.  You must navigate a moving maze while not being squashed against the edges.  This game is notable for having very different Game A / Game B options, with Game B giving you the challenge of clearing out creatures in each of the corners of the display rather than simply navigating the maze.

Recent work on Game & Watch emulation has come from Algestam, with earlier work being done by Sean Riddle and hap.  DarthMarino provided the artwork for more recently emulated units, while hydef was generally responsible for the artwork on ones emulated before 2020, links to the artwork are below

https://drive.google.com/drive/u/1/folders/1vl9O-0jIGCHHY_lrWpOwBtqTXEKsVGOY  DarthMarino 
https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1WLKcvynl0ky2mRL1UacA9yaiMTnNs4x5 hydef
